scope: Visual UX audit from latest screenshots provided in chat

items.issue: Tab bar looks consistent, but selected tab indicator could use stronger contrast for quick scan.
items.action: Evaluate increasing selected tab underline thickness or glow per style guide.

items.issue: Checkbox labels still feel slightly detached from indicators.
items.action: Reduce QCheckBox spacing/margin further or align indicator + label via custom checkbox row widget.

items.issue: Full/Targeted panels still feel sparse; whitespace could be tighter.
items.action: Reduce internal group padding or add secondary rows to balance vertical rhythm.

items.issue: Backups action row appears slightly off-center vertically in its box.
items.action: Verify equal top/bottom inset in Backups group; adjust _boxed_row top/bottom if needed.

items.issue: Details action buttons still look close to the bottom border.
items.action: Increase bottom inset for details action row container.

items.issue: Filters row alignment can be tightened (label + checkboxes).
items.action: Reduce filter label gap, ensure baseline alignment with scope/search controls.

items.issue: Dense text lacks section separators for quick scanning.
items.action: Add subtle separators or section headers within the insights text view.

items.issue: Run/Clear buttons sit close to the log border; may feel clipped.
items.action: Increase vertical inset for the actions row container.

items.issue: Selected Summary could benefit from a stronger visual anchor (e.g., selection pill, key metadata bar).
items.action: Add a small selection header bar with source name + modified time.

items.issue: Maintenance actions could be visually separated from output panel.
items.action: Add a subtle divider or reduce output panel height until needed.
